directions: Mix tuna, cranberries, apple, mayonnaise, green onion, sea salt, and black pepper together in a bowl; refrigerate 1 hour.
Put 2 cups spinach on each of 2 plates. Top spinach with about half the tuna salad.
ingredients: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna in water, drained
title: Amazingly Good and Healthy Tuna Salad
